title: Saudi Arabia puts 81 to death in its largest mass execution - The Associated Press - en Español
content: Saudi Arabia puts 81 to death in its largest mass execution  The Associated Press - en EspañolView Full Coverage on Google News
description: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) — Saudi Arabia on Saturday executed 81 people convicted of crimes ranging from killings to belonging to militant groups, the largest known mass execution carried out in the kingdom in its modern history.
